dialogue: Please, [color=hackerman]{name}[/color], you should know better than anyone that this line of work requires anonymity.
Uhm, doesn’t stop you from asking my alias though.
Well I am the client here, the one paying your bills.
But if you really need a name, just call me [color=shadow]Shadow[/color].
Look that really does not matter okay! Now did you, or did u not receive the attachment?
I did, it’s the private hospital right?
Yeah, the one that mugged me off cause I couldn’t use my BPJS-
Anyways, I’ve heard great things about you, [color=hackerman]{name}[/color].
Complete the job flawlessly and you’ll be rewarded handsomely, how generous I am! Ho Ho Ho
[color=whisper]Who even tries using BPJS at a private hospital[/color]
Oh yes, I'll get this over in a flash!
I’ll help you out as soon as you have the data ready, so you don’t need to worry about that. I’m such a noble soul, aren’t I?
[color=whisper]Taking sensitive medical information is kinda sussy, but I guess I have to since he’s offering a lot for this job.[/color]
